title: VONKK 70
lyrics: U is hei - lig, Heer! Je - sus, Chris - tus, Lamvan God,Ver-
You are ho - ly Lord! Je - sus, Christ, Lord, Lamb of God,our
los - ser, ons aan - bid U, U is hei - lig, Heer!
Sa - viour, we a - dore You, Youare ho - ly Lord!
Gees van Waar - heid, Troos - ter en ons Leids - man,
Ho - ly Spi - rit, Com - for - ter and Men - tor,
ons aan - bid U. U is hei - lig, Heer!
we a - dore You, You are ho - ly, Lord!
